title: BROTHER!!! Save him! - Hardcore Platformer
description: The legendary game is now on Steam! Can you prove that you are a good player, go through a difficult path and save your brother? This challenge is not for wimps!

title: My Night Job
description: My Night Job sends players into an abandoned building and sicks hordes of monsters on them.

title: Boxes: Lost Fragments
description: As a legendary thief, your next assignment lures you into a grand and lavish mansion.

title: Paragnosia
description: Observe every corner of your apartment by moving your camera along a rail that runs through the rooms. Find and take pictures of paranormal anomalies to exorcise them.

title: STALCRAFT: X Starter Edition [ADD-Ons]
description: STALCRAFT: X is a free-to-play MMOFPS with RPG elements. Start exploring the world of the Zone with a Starter Pack.

title: Return To Ash
description: The hospital was empty. Quiet, and brighter than usual... like waking up on a snow day. But I didn't feel cold. I didn't feel much of anything.

title: Lost in Anomaly
description: In Lost in Anomaly, you wake up on the 9th floor of an unknown building.

title: Magellania
description: Defeat your enemies with the power of love, friendship, and violent military aggression in Magellania, a hardcore tactics-RPG set in outer space.

title: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark
description: Delouse your room with sage and pack up your travel-sized ouija board, it’s time to re-enter Twin Lakes - America’s 34th most haunted city.

title: Nobody Wants to Die
description: Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York, 2329; immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. In this interactive noir story, lead the investigation using advanced technology, as Detective James Karra who risks it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite.

title: Arabian Gulf
description: Arabian Gulf is a single-player survival action game set in a harsh desert. Face relentless enemies, endure tough conditions, and fight through dangerous terrain using basic tools and weapons.

title: Alone in the Dark: The Trilogy 1+2+3
description: A suspicious suicide. A chilling curse. A malevolent power. Finally, a wicked dark secret. This is Derceto, a legendary Louisiana mansion where, against your better judgment, you're drawn into a world of shadows to explore the darker side of Jeremy Hartwood's imagination.

title: Nightreaper2
description: A dark stylized action game where you hunt villagers, escape the police, and battle four powerful kings in a fast-paced chaotic world.

title: Pixel Gun 3D - Poison Retro Set [DLC]
description: This content requires the base game Pixel Gun 3D: PC Edition on Epic in order to play.

title: Botany Manor
description: Welcome to Botany Manor, a stately home in 19th century England. You play as inhabitant Arabella Greene, a retired botanist.

title: Along the Edge
description: Following the loss of a baby, a breakup, and a surprise heritage, Daphné decides to leave everything behind to start a new life in the French countryside.

title: Untrusted
description: Untrusted is an online multiplayer (10 to 16 players) hacking / social deduction game: as an hacker, hack your target - as an undercover agent, disrupt the operation.

title: Cursedland
description: Step into Cursedland, a 2D indie action platformer where every jump, movement, and decision truly matters. This is a game built around precision, reflexes, and mastery, challenging players to push their skills to the limit while navigating a world filled with chaos, humor, and surreal surprises.

title: Kiki
description: A vibrant platformer with unique graphics and catchy chiptune soundtrack! Dodge treacherous traps and obstacles, overcome only by your agility and quick reflexes. Don’t miss the chance to test your abilities and become a true master of jumping!

title: Definitely Not Fried Chicken
description: Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena is a fantasy RPG/Management simulator set in the ruthless world of gladiatorial combat. Develop your academy and train your fighters. Increase your power and influence in the realm. Reap the rewards of your labours.

title: Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena
description: Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena is a fantasy RPG/Management simulator set in the ruthless world of gladiatorial combat. Develop your academy and train your fighters. Increase your power and influence in the realm. Reap the rewards of your labours.

title: Battle Simulator: Counter Stickman
description: The stickmen must strike at the terror enemy stickmen in this Battle Simulator

title: Smart Factory Tycoon
description: Smart Factory Tycoon inspired by Little Big Workshop is a tycoon management game about running your dream factory with robots. Design your dream factory, plan all steps of production, research new technologies and become a tycoon!

title: Rustler (Grand Theft Horse)
description: Become a medieval thug in a crazy open-world action game, full of pop-culture references. Complete insane quests, kill heroes, steal horses, fight guards, rob peasants, listen to some bard music, and much more! All packed in old-school gameplay style!

title: Initial Drift Online
description: Drift over some of Japan's most legendary mountain passes, compete against your friends or players from around the world in epic battles, make deliveries, buy new cars and set records in the world rankings!

title: Styx: Shards of Darkness
description: Styx returns in a new stealth adventure! Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in our goblin assassin's arsenal.

title: Styx: Master of Shadows
description: Styx: Master of Shadows is an infiltration game with RPG elements taking place in a dark fantasy universe, where you sneak, steal and assassinate your way through as Styx, a Goblin two-centuries of age.

title: Billie's Wheelie
description: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.

title: Bloons TD 6
description: Mega Popular Tower Defense Game

title: Wildgate
description: Wildgate is a PvPvE multiplayer shooter that blends tactical ship-to-ship combat with fast-paced first-person action.

title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
description: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS recreates epic conflict across ancient China in an age of heroes and legends, combining gripping empire-building, statecraft and conquest with stunning real-time battles.

title: Chivalry 2
description: Chivalry 2 is a multiplayer first person slasher inspired by epic medieval movie battles. Players are thrust into the action of every iconic moment of the era - from clashing swords, to storms of flaming arrows, to sprawling castle sieges and more.

title: Trine Classic Collection
description: Experience the magic of the puzzle-platforming Trine series with Trine Classic Collection. Includes four titles: Trine Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, Trine 3: Artifacts of Power and Trine 4: Definitive Edition.

title: Viewfinder
description: Challenge perception, redefine reality, and reshape the world around you with an instant camera.

title: SKALD: Against the Black Priory
description: SKALD is a retro-style party-based RPG set in a grim-dark fantasy world of tragic heroes, violent deaths and Lovecraftian horror.

title: Cassette Beasts
description: Collect awesome monsters to use during turn-based battles in this open-world RPG, now with online multiplayer mode.

title: We Were Here Together
description: As we explore these frozen wastes, misfortune strikes once again. Through the fierce blizzard, a flare lights the sky, followed by a cry for help over the radio - broken, dying..

title: Caveman World: Mountains of Unga Boonga
description: Caveman World: Mountains of Unga Boonga is a retro inspired platformer adventure game set in fantasy prehistoric time.

title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut
description: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal.

title: The Callisto Protocol
description: Survive to escape the horrors of Callisto. Using a unique blend of shooting and close-quarters combat, players will need to combat rapidly evolving creatures while scavenging to unlock new weapons and gear to outrun the growing threat of Jupiter's Dead Moon.

title: SNK 40th Anniversary Collection
description: SNK 40th Anniversary Collection is the ultimate collection of classic arcade games from SNK's golden age with 24 different nostalgic titles back from the 1980s

title: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night
description: Igavania Returns! Play as Miriam, an orphan scarred by an alchemist's curse which slowly crystallizes her body.

title: Train Sim World® 6: Spirit of Steam: Liverpool Lime Street - Crewe Route Add-On
description: This content requires the base game Train Sim World® 6 on Steam in order to play.

title: Paradise Killer
description: Paradise Island, a world outside reality. There’s been a murder only investigation freak Lady Love Dies can solve.

title: The Deed: Dynasty
description: Getting away with murder has never been easy. These three members of a proud and noble family are separated by five centuries, but have in common a vengeful and murderous intent. Plans must be formed, blood must be spilled and evidence must be planted ...

title: Sorry We're Closed
description: Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic, single-player survival horror game with rich lore, deep characters and multiple endings. Fight in first person with demonic weapons. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets and solve puzzles.

title: Blood West
description: Weird west legends meet eldritch horror in BLOOD WEST, an immersive stealth FPS. Become the Undead Gunslinger, doomed to roam the barren lands until he manages to purge their curse, freeing his soul.

title: Underecroft Warriors
description: Crush the forces of hell and get a high score in this addictive, action-packed, arcade-inspired twin-stick shooter!

title: Eternights
description: Eternights is a dating action game where you try to make the most out of life during the apocalypse. Monday: Go on a date. Tuesday: Clear dungeon. Friday: Freak out! The clock is ticking!!

title: Banana Hell: Mountain of Madness
description: Jump your way to get the blue diamond as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!

title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
description: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology.

title: Toy Tinker Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to be a toy tinker? This is a unique chance to become one! Repair toys and start your toy-museums to make everyone happy!

title: 100% Orange Juice
description: 100% Orange Juice is a digital multiplayer board game populated by developer Orange Juice's all-star cast.

title: Rat Quest
description: In this platformer, jumping will be your main mechanic as you climb the level, each jump matters, if you miss a jump, you have to restart. You may be small but so are the platforms.

title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Hogwarts Legacy is an immersive, open-world action RPG. Now you can take control of the action and be at the center of your own adventure in the wizarding world.

title: Wild Terra 2: New Lands
description: MMORPG full of details that create a unique immersion and the spirit of adventure! Play your role in the life-filled medieval world controlled by players.

title: One Gun Guy
description: One Gun Guy is a straight forward no nonsense action platformer, one giant level littered with player upgrades, hazards to tackle, enemies to destroy, a boss to kill, and multiple difficulty settings.

title: Just Ignore Them
description: One night can feel like a lifetime of pain, suffering and horror to a child...do you have what it takes to survive the night? Play as an 8 year old child who is tormented by monsters in his house. Your choices make his future which lives can be saved or ended.

title: Black Desert
description: However, this offer is region-limited, So these are the regions who are unable to redeem this offer: South Asia , South Korea, China, Israel

title: The Darkside Detective
description: Grab your trench coat, tune your sixth sense and join the Darkside Division as they investigate the outright bizarre cases of Twin Lakes.

title: The Jackbox Party Pack 4
description: The fourth pack in this storied party game franchise features Fibbage 3 and its new game mode, Fibbage: Enough About You;..

title: Immortals Fenyx Rising
description: Immortals Fenyx Rising brings grand mythological adventure to life. Play as Fenyx on a quest to save the Greek gods.
